name: Eighteen (Next Branch Games)
description:
Created for Weekly Game Jam - Week 155. 

THEME: Cycle

The goal of the game is for the player to maintain average weight. In the game, everyday starts at 8:00AM and ends at 6:00PM. Every hour(which is 30 seconds in the game), a player is required to eat something. Everything they eat contributes to their overall weight. At the end of the day, if they are still within the average weight limit, they can continue to the next day. And the cycle continues. 

CONTROLS: Use ARROW KEYS to move and SPACE to jump to pick up the food.
